description: All Moscow's metro stations are among public sites targeted, but it is unclear who is responsible.
title: Russia bomb hoaxes: Thousands evacuated as campaign targets Moscow
title_page: Russia bomb hoaxes: Thousands evacuated as campaign targets Moscow - BBC News
maintext: "Hoax bombs have been targeting shopping centres, courts and train stations all over Moscow. Security has been boosted, court hearings moved, and government agencies are in a complete stupor. But nobody's going to tell you about that, you're supposed to watch the omnipresent Old Geezer [Putin]," one Twitter user said (in Russian).
